author: dan131riley
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes several uninitialized variable uses reported by valgrind.  Most of these are in DataFormats, where the use of the uninitialized variables was reported in the output module.

#### PR validation:

Trivial technical fix, no physics or computational performance changes expected.  A limited matrix test found no unexpected failures.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1748
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1745
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1744
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1750
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1747
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1751
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1752
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1746
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1749
title: Fixes for uninitialized variable use detected by valgrind
